alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 19 at 12:49PM PST until January 20 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern portions of the Shasta Valley in Central Siskiyou County. This includes Weed and Interstate 5 between Weed and Grenada. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 7 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds are expected Saturday morning and afternoon. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
